divs: sighting detailswe were leaving my parents house around 8pm and saw the object directly above my parents house(approx. 500 ft above). it was a large red\orange light about 1\4 the size of a full moon, with smaller yellow\white lights (3-4) that seemed attatched right behind. my wife and i ran inside to show my parents and they came outside too. it was flying fairly slow east to west, also gaining altitude. after approx. 2 min it started heading more north in 5 min it have dissapeared out of our sight.
Summary: Large red/orange bright light with yellow/white lights behind it flew east to n.west ascending
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Grand Junction
There were no other sightings in Grand Junction on or around December 24th 2011
